image.altText: Elise Archer rests her head on her hand in parliament.

props.synopsis: Former Tasmanian Liberal MP Elise Archer says she's "reconsidering" quitting state parliament and might sit as an Independent, which an electoral analyst says could trigger an early state election.

title.children: Elise Archer 'reconsidering' quitting parliament, early election risk for Tasmanian Liberals

image.altText: Panthers celebrate

props.synopsis: Panthers star Nathan Cleary has scored a stunning late try to give Penrith their third premiership in a row,Â after Broncos young gun Ezra Mam earlier scored three tries. Follow live.

title.children: Late Cleary magic concludes stunning Panthers comeback over Broncos to claim third NRL premiership in a row

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: This mountain of a man, this legend of the sport at just 25 years of age has won the Clive Churchill Medal for the second time, adding to his 2021 honour. Even, nay especially, with Jarome Luai sidelined and Isaah Yeo off for 15 minutes with an HIA, Nathan Cleary grabbed this team and said "come with me". And boy did they. He finishes with a try (the match-winner), two try assists, 162 run metres, four goals, four tackle breaks, two line breaks and 660 kicking metres. The finish to that game might be the greatest 25-minute stretch of individual rugby league football I've ever witnessed. "Hardest game I've ever played," Cleary says on the podium, praising the Broncos and Ezra Mam in particular, as "a freak". "They're easily the most dangerous team in the NRL," he tells ABC Sport. "Ezra and Reece made me look stupid a couple of times."
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: Nathan Cleary. That's it, that's the headline.

children.content: (Getty)
This mountain of a man, this legend of the sport at just 25 years of age has
won the Clive Churchill Medal for the second time
, adding to his 2021 honour.
Even, nay especially, with Jarome Luai sidelined and Isaah Yeo off for 15 minutes with an HIA, Nathan Cleary grabbed this team and said "come with me". And boy did they.
He finishes with a try (the match-winner), two try assists, 162 run metres, four goals, four tackle breaks, two line breaks and 660 kicking metres.
The finish to that game might be the greatest 25-minute stretch of individual rugby league football I've ever witnessed.

props.alt: Penrith Panthers halfback Nathan Cleary shouts with joy during the NRL grand final.

children.content: (Getty)
"Hardest game I've ever played," Cleary says on the podium, praising the Broncos and Ezra Mam in particular, as "a freak".
"They're easily the most dangerous team in the NRL," he tells ABC Sport.
"Ezra and Reece made me look stupid a couple of times."

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: What a truly phenomenal comeback by this unbelievable team. It was 24-8 when Ezra Mam scored his third try in the 54th minute. And still it felt like the Broncos had given them too much time. And so it proved. Even, actually especially, with Jarome Luai sidelined by injury and Isaah Yeo, Nathan Cleary grabbed this time by the scruff of the neck and said "come with me" to triple premiership glory. The Brisbane Broncos are on the wrong side of yet another heartbreaker in yet another one of the greatest grand finals ever that they absolutely will never want to hear about again.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: THE PENRITH PANTHERS ARE THREE-TIME NRL PREMIERS!!!

children.content: (Getty)
What a truly phenomenal comeback by this unbelievable team.
It was 24-8 when Ezra Mam scored his third try in the 54th minute. And still it felt like the Broncos had given them too much time.
And so it proved.
Even, actually especially, with Jarome Luai sidelined by injury and Isaah Yeo, Nathan Cleary grabbed this time by the scruff of the neck and said "come with me" to triple premiership glory.
The Brisbane Broncos are on the wrong side of yet another heartbreaker in yet another one of the greatest grand finals ever that they absolutely will never want to hear about again.

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: There was nothing happening when the ball went to the short side, but he stood up his opposite number Adam Reynolds, then Billy Walters, then Reece Walsh to dot down under the posts. Nathan Cleary will convert from right in front of the uprights. Penrith are in front 26-24 with less than two minutes to play.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: NATHAN CLEARY IS THE HERO FOR PENRITH!!!

children.content: There was nothing happening when the ball went to the short side, but he stood up his opposite number Adam Reynolds, then Billy Walters, then Reece Walsh to dot down under the posts.
Nathan Cleary will convert from right in front of the uprights.
Penrith are in front 26-24 with less than two minutes to play.
